title: Most bottom row of home screen apps Google pixel 4a 5g above Google assistant widjet ??
content: Hi everyone I just got my pixel 4a 5g and I'm having trouble with the default row off apps that appear at the bottom of every home screen above the assistant widjet I wanted to change one and did so using the drag and remove function but then my phone randomly added another in its place and everytime I drag and remove it does so again with another random app and I can't pick the one I would like can anyone help with this please and thankyou
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
